settings.fraction-option-hint: If selected, all CR values under '1' are displayed as a fraciton. If not selected, all CR and Deadly Encounter Benchmark values are displayed as a decimal
settings.token-outline-hint: If selected, will display an outline around all selected tokens for a brief period. Not recommended if lots of tokens are selected. Requires Token Magic FX
settings.wordtip-option-hint: If selected, will display a tooltip when the mouse hovers over the Pop-Up title
settings.chat-option-hint: Choose how to display the Deadly Encounter Benchmark
